Dataset Property

The “Dataset property” tab allows both visual and numerical analysis of the dataset. Also in this tab, the importance of features can be computed using two different methods. In this way, users can explore the features of the dataset and thus gain in-depth knowledge about the dataset. The default version of the “Dataset Property” tab is shown in Figure 22.
